a.n: Passion in premiere - Giovanni Maria Trabaci

p.k: A first: an Early Baroque passion which will be heard again for the first time in the modern age. Giovanni Maria Trabaci was a style pioneer who broke with the Neapolitan unison tradition and was the first composer to write a complete passion cycle. With Jean-Marc Aymes's unerring nose for quality, this concert belongs at the top of your list of favourites.
